author: Melanie Grayce West
title: Debt-Collection Firm Settles Class-Action Lawsuit
text:
A New Jersey-based debt-collection business and its law firm have agreed to settle a class-action lawsuit that alleged they abused the New York City civil court system in trying to collect tens of millions of dollars on thousands of AT&T Wireless debts that may have been owed by New Yorkers.
Asta Funding Inc. of Englewood Cliffs, N.J., a subsidiary of Palisades Collection LLC, and the law firm Pressler & Pressler of Parsippany, N.J., have proposed to pay a combined $3.9 million to settle the charges, according to...
